title: Zion’s Injury, Buddy Gets Paid, and Way-Too-Early Playoffs Predictions | Heat Check
description:
The NBA-China story drags on, Zion Williamson’s injury delays his much-anticipated debut, and Buddy Hield reaches an extension with the Sacramento Kings (3:37). Then: Which teams will actually make the playoffs (18:06)?

Host: John Gonzalez
Guests: Dan Devine, Haley O’Shaughnessy

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
